metadata.title: CVE-2019-14274 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
MCPP 2.7.2 has a heap-based buffer overflow in the do_msg() function in support.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-14274` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmcpp0 - 2.7.2-5
mcpp - 2.7.2-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mcpp package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.7.2-5').
